pageDescription: Control how users can register and log in to the system.

allowInvitation.label: Allow Registration by Invitation
allowInvitation.description: If active, users can register using an invitation code.

allowPublicRegistration.label: Allow Public Registration
allowPublicRegistration.description: If active, anyone with a valid account (e.g., Google) can sign in and create a user profile in the system. If disabled, only pre-registered users can log in.

allowEmailLogin.label: Allow Login with Email/Password
allowEmailLogin.description: Allows the traditional login method with email and password.

allowPhoneLogin.label: Allow Login with Phone
allowPhoneLogin.description: Enables authentication via SMS or phone call.

allowGoogleLogin.label: Allow Login with Google
allowGoogleLogin.description: Allows users to log in with their Google accounts.

contextAlert.masterDescription: These are the default settings for the entire system.
contextAlert.instanceDescription: You are overriding the default settings for this instance.
contextAlert.subInstanceDescription: You are overriding the parent instance settings for this sub-instance.
contextAlert.saveToCustomizeDescription: Changes will be saved as a custom configuration for this context.

revertDialog.title: Confirm Reversion
revertDialog.description: Are you sure you want to revert the settings to the inherited default? Customizations made for {contextName} will be lost.
